title: An Approach to the Explanation of Annotator-level Differences in Toxicity Detection Through Irony
description: My Bachelor's thesis project, investigating whether irony in messages could influence the toxicity rating given by graders belonging to different social groups. Awareded full marks.

title: QR Code Generator
description: Developed for the '20875 - Software Engineering' course, is a Python QR Code generator developed from scratch to be used through CLI inputs..
